articles.title: Donald Trump gives Iran 'maximum two weeks' for decision; rules out European mediation; says 'Europe can' - Times of India
articles.description: US News: President Trump has given Iran a maximum of two weeks to avoid potential US airstrikes, suggesting action could come sooner than previously indicated.

articles.author: Ben Golliver
articles.title: Tyrese Haliburton plays through injury, sparks Pacers to force Game 7 - The Washington Post
articles.description: Haliburton scores 14 points in 23 minutes, and Indiana rolls at home, 108-91, to send the NBA Finals to a winner-take-all finale in Oklahoma City on Sunday night.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS For Indiana Pacers guard Tyrese Haliburton, one good leg was more than enough to deny the Oklahoma City Thunder in its first chance to win the NBA championship.
Haliburton gutted throug… [+6910 chars]
